name: Oren's Unsplash Widget
author: Oren Yomtov

sections.description:
Quickly display your Unsplash photos inside WordPress widget.

This plugin uses the Unsplash API to fetch the latest photos from your desired profile.

Read more about Unsplash’s terms, API terms, and privacy policy.

Features

  • Change thumbnail size
  • Caching system integrated for better performance

Unsplash Widget plugin is created by Oren Yomtov, and built upon the prior work of Meks

Live example?

You can see Simple Unsplash Widget live example on my website
sections.installation:
1. Upload unsplash-widget.zip to plugins via WordPress admin panel or upload unzipped folder to your wp-content/plugins/ folder
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance -> Widgets to add and setup the widget
sections.faq: For any questions, error reports and suggestions please visit https://orenyomtov.com/contact
